blogs.title: The Surprising Benefits of Replacing Paper Towels with Reusable Cotton Rags
blogs.author: Joanna Zaino
blogs.content: As a mom, I always strive to make the best choices for my family, especially when it comes to our household habits. For years, we grossly overused paper towels. They were convenient, sure, but deep down, I knew our reliance on them wasnâ€™t the best for the environment or our budget. I often found myself wondering about the waste we were unconsciously contributing to every time we grabbed yet another paper towel.
